relation: Control of hypertension is a significant health problem.
I do a good job of treating my patients' hypertension.
Clinical practice guidelines are important to follow when treating patients.
I believe that a significant barrier to blood pressure control is patient non-compliance.
I believe that a significant barrier to blood pressure control is physician inaction.
I am familiar with the content of JNC 7
pageTitle: Physician reported perception in the treatment of high blood pressure does not correspond to practice.
